title: Opportunity cost is value of next best option

content.question: The opportunity cost of an activity is

choices.label: the amount of time spent on the activity
the value of the benefit received from performing the activity
the value of the forgone benefit of the next best alternative
zero if the activity offered no benefits
the sum of benefits from all the sacrificed alternatives

content.answer: the value of the forgone benefit of the next best alternative
